channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.3 is available
item.description: The third patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download!

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - March 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the third time this year and streamed live on March 8th, 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.2 is available
item.description: The second patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download!

item.title: Announcing March PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The third Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, March 8th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - February
item.description: As we move into March, let’s take a moment to review the progress made in February across the project. While PrestaShop 8.0.2 and 8.1 are certainly two key priorities, a lot of work has also been put in on other aspects of the project. Nonetheless, the final touches for PrestaShop 8.0.2 are currently underway, and progress on PrestaShop 8.1 continues to move forward steadily. Additionally, several exciting new features have been merged that will be incorporated into PrestaShop 9.0.

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – February 2023 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it is also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in February!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The beta version of PrestaShop 8.1 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - February 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the second time this year and streamed live on February 8th, 2023.

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – January 2023 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it is also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in January!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - January 2023
item.description: The PrestaShop project had a busy January with a focus on releasing PrestaShop 8.0.1 and final touches for PrestaShop 8.1 before the feature-freeze. Let’s take a closer look at what happened in the project last month.

item.title: Announcing February PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The second Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, February 8th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 is now in feature freeze
item.description: As of February 1, 2023, PrestaShop version 8.1 has entered the feature freeze phase. This article provides more information about the feature freeze, what the next steps will be, and what to expect from PrestaShop 8.1.

item.title: GitHub Discussions are now enabled in the PrestaShop Project!
item.description: Today, GitHub Discussions are being enabled for the PrestaShop Project. This feature will provide a more organized and easily accessible way for community members to collaborate, ask questions, and share ideas.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - January 2023
item.description: The project’s first live update was held for the first time this year and streamed live on January 11th, 2023.

item.title: Announcing January PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The first Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, January 11th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! Public Demo is now called Live update, as it is planned to experiment with formats other than you could see in previous sessions, like live coding, interviews, etc.
